Package net.happybrackets.core.control

Class DynamicControlParent

java.lang.Object
net.happybrackets.core.control.DynamicControlParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanControl, ClassObjectControl, FloatControl, IntegerControl, TextControl, TriggerControl
public abstract class DynamicControlParent
extends java.lang.Object
The DynamicControlParent facilitates a simplified abstract API to implement the DynamicControl class. The values can be represented as sliders, text boxes, check boxes, and buttons

A message can either be:
an integer - IntegerControl,
a double - FloatControl,
a string - TextControl,
a Boolean - BooleanControl,
a trigger - TriggerControl, or
a complete class - ClassObjectControl.

    • addControlTarget

      public void addControlTarget​(java.lang.String... devices)
      Add one or more device names or IP address as a target for DynamicControl messages. The control must have ControlScope.TARGET scope to have any effect
      Parameters:
      devices - the device name or IP address to target

    • setControlTarget

      public void setControlTarget​(java.lang.String... devices)
      Clear existing targets and add one or more device names or IP address as a target for DynamicControl messages. The control must have ControlScope.TARGET scope to have any effect
      Parameters:
      devices - the device name or IP address to target

    • addControlTarget

      public void addControlTarget​(java.net.InetAddress... deviceAddresses)
      Add one or more InetAddress as a target for DynamicControl messages. The control must have ControlScope.TARGET scope to have any effect
      Parameters:
      deviceAddresses - the addresses of the targets

    • setControlTarget

      public void setControlTarget​(java.net.InetAddress... deviceAddresses)

      Parameters:
      deviceAddresses - the addresses of the targets

    • clearControlTargets

      public void clearControlTargets()
      Erase all target addresses for the DynamicControl

    • removeControlTarget

      public void removeControlTarget​(java.lang.String... devices)
      Remove one or more device name or IP address as a target for DynamicControl messages. The control must have ControlScope.TARGET scope to have any effect
      Parameters:
      devices - the device names or IP addresses to remove as targets

    • removeControlTarget

      public void removeControlTarget​(java.net.InetAddress... inetAddresses)
      Remove one or more InetAddress as a target for DynamicControl messages. The control must have ControlScope.TARGET scope to have any effect
      Parameters:
      inetAddresses - the addresses of the targets to remove

    • setControlScope

      public DynamicControlParent setControlScope​(ControlScope new_scope)
      Changed the ControlScope the object has has. It will update control map so the correct events will be generated based on its scope
      Parameters:
      new_scope - The new Control Scope
      Returns:
      this object
